details.label: ID number
details.helperText: All reasonable safeguards have been taken to secure and protect your personal information.

details.text: By pressing proceed, you consent to Auto&General processing your personal information for insurance and risk management purposes.

details.html: Use of personal information

In order to provide you with the services we are required to process your personal information and will do so lawfully in accordance with our business requirements and legal obligations.

You acknowledge that the personal information may be verified and / or processed for insurance, financial services and risk management purposes by Auto&General and it’s associates against any other reasonable and legitimate sources or databases to ensure the accuracy and completeness of any personal information.

Pre-populated information displayed is retrieved from legitimate sources as well as our internal database.

What is the replacement value of your home contents?

The replacement value is what it will cost you to replace all your belongings with new items. If the exact new item cannot be found we will replace it with a similar new item.

If you claim, we will calculate the replacement value for which you should have insured your home contents. If you insured them for less than that, we will only pay a part of your claim.
